name: Persian Silver
description:
Welcome to Persian Silver!

Persian Silver is a city-building turn-based strategy game for 2 players, with the goal to build an economy, train an army and destroy the opponent's nation. The players can play on the same computer in split-screen mode or on two different computers in the same LAN.

At the beginning of each turn the player is awarded with his produce in GOLD, FOOD and WOOD, which can be used to build buildings and units. Grow a strong economy to raise an army and fight the enemy.

If you are stuck or do not know what to do next, check out the tutorial by clicking the help button. If you are still unsatisfied please leave a comment below and I'll fix it as soon as possible.

Thanks for playing and enjoy the game!
